isValidContact

public static boolean isValidContact(ServerTemplate server,
                                     java.net.Socket socket)
Validates a socket (simple DOS and overload protection) Ensures that no client connects faster than ServerTemplate.getInterval(). Ensures that the total number of client connects within ServerTemplate.getInterval() dosen't reach ServerTemplate.getRequests()

Parameters:
server - The server to protect
socket - The socket to protect
See Also:
ServerTemplate.getInterval(), ServerTemplate.getRequests()
